summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PDF Reading Timer application. All core features working correctly including PDF upload, text analysis, reading time calculation (180 WPM), question detection (35s per question), dual timers, and Spanish interface.
passed_tests: API root endpoint returns correct message
PDF upload validation rejects non-PDF files
Question time calculation accurate (35s per question)
Total time calculation correct (reading + question time)
Frontend upload zone visible and functional
Countdown timer shows time until last questions
Paragraph cards display with correct time breakdown
All data-testid attributes present for testing
